list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: winding in a continuous and gradually widening (or tightening) curve, either around a central point on a flat plane or about an axis so as to form a cone.
a spiral curve, shape, or pattern.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he spotted a spiral of smoke
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh phát hiện ra một hình xoắn ốc của khói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a progressive rise or fall of prices, wages, etc., each responding to an upward or downward stimulus provided by a previous one.
a pass or kick that moves smoothly through the air while spinning on its long axis.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a wisp of smoke spiraled up from the trees
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một wisp khói xoắn lên từ cây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: show a continuous and dramatic increase.
